comment_body: I like the irony of using veggies from a prison garden

Good story!

Reminds me of my friend, even she was little the family were eating porridge (oatmeal) she complained throughout that she didn't want it and it was moving. Everyone else had finished, her dad was like "oh I'll eat yours then" and as he grabbed her bowl realised she was right, there was something moving. Weevils.
